name: Oranguru
author: Akira Komayama
flavor_text: Deep in the jungle, high in the lofty canopy, this Pokémon abides. On rare occasions, it shows up at the beach to match wits with Slowking.

abilities.name: Instruct
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
